description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the supply of quantity 1 Radome, installation of the new purchased Radome. There are security requirements associated with this requirement.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
**Title:** Installation of Radome
**Reference Number:** cb-432-76373001
**Procurement Category:** Goods
**Commodity Classification:** 43221728 - Radome or radar dome

**Announcement Details**
* **Announcement Date:** 2024-04-26
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-05-28, 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-06-10
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

**Procurement Overview**
The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit offers for the supply and installation of a single Radome. The scope of work includes the provision of a Radome as per the specified requirements.

**Security Considerations**
Bidders must adhere to the security requirements outlined in Part 1 – General Information and Part 6 – Resulting Contract Clauses. For further information, refer to the Industrial Security Program (ISP) website (http://ssi-iss.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html).

**Services Requirements**
Bidders must provide information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.

**Additional Information**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachments

* [Radome Solicitation Document (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36880/w8485-248125_tcr_cold_lake_radome.pdf)
* [Radome Solicitation Document (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36880/w8485-248125_amd_1_fr.pdf)

### Points of Contact

* **Alexandre Hein**
	+ Email: Alexandre.Hein@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (000) 000-0000

### Notice Details

* **Notice URL (English):** N/A
* **Notice URL (French):** N/A

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade
